abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Technical Assistance Project
            will address two major weaknesses in development
            administration in Zambia which include: (a) inadequate
            capacity to carry out macroeconomic analysis; and (b) the
            lack of timely and accurate financial information required
            for analysis and the efficient management of the economy.
            Related to these two main aid objectives, the project will
            also strengthen the processes of budget preparation and
            revenue estimation and improve coordination between planning
            and budgeting. Specifically, the project would provide: (i)
            macroeconomic analysis; (ii) a financial management system;
            (iii) budget and revenue specialists; as well as (iv)
            training; and (v) follow-up services to Technical Assistance I.
